content: complimentary pattern fall fungi design by bobbi intveld pattern no for use with 202418 woolstok worsted for use with woolstok worsted fall fungi design by bobbi intveld description create your own colorful fungi using just one fall festival bundle knit them with simple color changes at the cap solid or add stripes and make them unique each mushroom can be your own distinct combination experience level gauge in stockinette st 6 sts and 7 row = 1 advanced beginner sizes finished measurements approx 5½ after stuffing at small medium large small circumference largest area approx 3 small height 7¾ after stuffing at largest medium circumference area approx 3½ medium height 9 after stuffing at largest area large circumference approx 4 ¼ large height materials yarn needles 4mm double pointed needles or size needed woolstok worsted bundle size 6 to obtain gauge 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds 1 bundle fall festival p 02 blue sky fibers color shown color shown no 1326 no 1309 mossy green earth ivy color shown color shown no 1302 no 1312 gravel road drift wood color shown color shown no 1303 no 1323 highland fleece ember glow color shown no 1311 rusted roof other tools stitch marker s in contrasting colors tapestry needle & stuffing notes all mushrooms are knit from the bottom up weaving in ends as you go our stems have been filled with plastic pellets and the tops with fiber fill stuffed as desired grams used per mushroom approx 8 grams small approx 10 grams medium approx 15 grams large step no 1 mushrooms small mushroom k round 7 stem *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end 9 sts round 8 co 6 sts divide onto 3 dpns evenly and join in the round k being careful not to twist sts rnds 9 k ribs round 1 *k1 lli repeat from * to end of round 12 sts *kfb repeat from * to end of round 18 sts round 2 round 10 k *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round rnds 3 round 11 *k2 lli repeat from * to end of round 18 sts *k1 p1 m1p repeat from * to end of round 27 sts round 4 round 12 k *k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round round 5 round 13 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 12 sts round 6 p 03 blue sky fibers cap change color if desired ribs *k1 lli k2 repeat from * to end of round 36 sts *kfb repeat from * to end of round 24 sts round 14 round 22 p *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 15 round 23 k *k1 p1 m1p repeat to end of round 36 sts rnds 16-17 round 24 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 27 sts *k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round round 18 round 25 k *k1 p2 m1p repeat to end of round 48
